explains: n. 岩架；壁架；窗台；暗礁；矿层

sentences.en: She put the vase of flowers on the window ledge.
sentences.cn: 她把那瓶花放在窗台上。

sentences.en: Dorothy had climbed onto the ledge outside his window.
sentences.cn: 多萝西已经爬到了他窗台外面。

sentences.en: He cupped his hands and gave her a boost up to the ledge.
sentences.cn: 他双手拢作杯状把她托上了窗台。
